citeinfo.title: GIS.GIS.COA_BRIDGES_MERGED

descript.abstract: Data Created for Public Works. Maitainence responsiiblies was dervied from Public Works. No Assurances can be made on the spatial and data accuracy. user should understand that this data is not verified in any way. From old shapefiles on common drive (m) in comboination with a spreadsheet maintianed by the City of Ashevilles Public Works Department which identifies City Maintained Bridges.
descript.purpose: Data was added for mapping locations of city maintained bridges. No Assurances can be made on the spatial and data accuracy. user should understand that this data is not verified in any way. From old shapefiles on common drive (m).
